synopsis: In this solo episode, Devam shares his transformative journey after quitting his job, reflecting on personal growth, the importance of taking breaks, and the joy of exploring new passions like DJing and painting. He emphasizes the significance of connecting with oneself and the value of living authentically, while also providing insights on navigating friendships and personal expectations.
quotes: You need to be at peace with the way you're living your life.
If you're just staying numb and in the same cycles of stress and release, you're not helping anyone.
The goal of this break is to learn how to breathe.
Sometimes it's enough to just breathe. Like that's okay.
If you have privilege, you should use it.
We're not on this planet to slave away and be productivity monkeys.
Itâ€™s not about the results. It's about the process.
I fell into a productivity trap, and I just had to let some of these things go.
Your time and energy are valuable; if you don't like the people, don't go.
Perchance to dream, perchance to live.
